# Shorty - URL Shortener Service

**Summary:** Shorty is a free, fast URL shortener with built-in QR code generation. Shorten long URLs instantly and generate QR codes for easy sharing.

**Key Features:**
- Instant URL shortening with 7-character unique codes
- Automatic QR code generation for every shortened URL
- Click tracking and analytics
- Secure URL validation (blocks private IPs, localhost)
- RESTful API for developers
- Fast and reliable redirects (301 permanent redirects)

**Use Cases:**
- Social media link sharing
- Marketing campaigns with trackable links
- Business cards with QR codes
- Email campaigns with concise URLs
- Developer API integration for applications
- Affiliate marketing with custom short links

**Technical Details:**
- Built with FastAPI and Python
- PostgreSQL database for reliable storage
- 7-character alphanumeric short codes (62^7 possibilities)
- 301 permanent redirects for SEO benefits
- Rate limiting enabled for fair usage
- Comprehensive input validation and security

**API Features:**
- RESTful API endpoint at /api/link
- JSON response format with status, data, and message
- Returns short URL and base64-encoded QR code image
- URL validation (http/https only, blocks private IPs)

**Security:**
- Blocks localhost and private IP addresses
- URL length validation (up to 2048 characters)
- HTTP/HTTPS scheme validation only
- Rate limiting per IP address

**Contact:** http://localhost:8080/
**Repository:** https://github.com/
**License:** MIT
**Last Updated:** 2026-01-17

**Getting Started:**
1. Visit http://localhost:8080/
2. Enter your long URL
3. Get your shortened link and QR code instantly
4. Share anywhere!

**Developer Integration:**
POST /api/link with JSON body:
{
  "link": "https://example.com/your-long-url"
}

Response:
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "link": "http://localhost:8080/AbCdEfG",
    "qr": "base64-encoded-png-image"
  },
  "message": "Successfully generated the link"
}
